title: South American Empanadas
ingredients: ['300g boneless sirloin steak, cut into small cubes', 'olive oil', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '2-3 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 tablespoons currants, soaked in boiling water for 10 mins, then drained', '1 teaspoon crushed dried red chilli flakes', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 packet shortcrust pastry, room temperature', 'green olives', '2 boiled eggs, cut into eighths', 'water']
